name: Solitaire 2017 - Patience Klondike
description:
Solitaire is a popular card game. Many people refer to Solitaire as Klondike or Patience, it being one of the better known of the family of patience games.

Features:
* OLD classic playing cards!!!
* High resolution playing board
* Undo
* Auto-save
* Configure auto-fill in settings

Enjoy!

Game Rules.
Cards are dealt in 7 piles as you see in the picture.
The game is won when all cards are moved into the 4 foundations at top.
4 foundation piles start with Ace and will be built upon it in ascending order with cards of the same suit from Ace to King.
Move cards from one of the 7 tableau to another by arranging them in descending order and with alternating colours.
Take a card from un-dealt pile and put it to one of the 7 piles or one of the 4 foundations.
